Comedy.title: 3 Idiots
Comedy.description: 3 Idiots is a 2009 Indian coming-of-age comedy-drama film directed by Rajkumar Hirani.

Comedy.title: PK
Comedy.description: PK is a 2014 Indian satirical comedy-drama film directed by Rajkumar Hirani.

Comedy.title: Queen
Comedy.description: Queen is a 2013 Indian comedy-drama film directed by Vikas Bahl.

Comedy.title: Super Deluxe
Comedy.description: Super Deluxe is a Tamil-language black comedy-drama directed by Thiagarajan Kumararaja. It follows the interconnected lives of several characters over the course of a day.

Comedy.title: Panchayat
Comedy.description: A comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.

Comedy.title: Dhamaal
Comedy.description: Dhamaal is a hilarious comedy film that follows the misadventures of four friends who embark on a quest to find a hidden treasure. Their journey is filled with slapstick humor, unexpected twists, and madcap escapades.

Comedy.title: Double Dhamaal
Comedy.description: Double Dhamaal is a rib-tickling sequel to the hit comedy 'Dhamaal.' This time, the four friends find themselves in even crazier situations as they try to outsmart a corrupt businessman and his cronies. Packed with double the laughter, double the fun, and double the dhamaal!

Comedy.title: Total Dhamaal
Comedy.description: Total Dhamaal is a roller-coaster ride of comedy, action, and adventure. When a group of eccentric individuals set out on a treasure hunt, they encounter wild animals, treacherous terrains, and each other's eccentricities. With non-stop laughs and heart-pounding thrills, it's total dhamaal all the way!
